title: Tara-Jane Stanley
text:
Tara-Jane Stanley is an English <a href="rugby%20league">rugby league</a> footballer. She has played at representative level for <a href="England%20women%27s%20national%20rugby%20league%20team">England</a>, and club level for <a href="Thatto%20Heath%20Crusaders">Thatto Heath Crusaders</a> (in <a href="St%20Helens%2C%20Merseyside">St Helens, Merseyside</a>), and <a href="Castleford%20Tigers%20Women">Castleford Tigers Women</a>.
The full-back was in the running for the inaugural <a href="Woman%20of%20Steel">Woman of Steel</a> award in 2018 but lost out to <a href="Castleford%20Tigers">Castleford Tigers</a> teammate <a href="Georgia%20Roche">Georgia Roche</a>.
Stanley began her rugby career playing for <a href="Moorfield%20Angels">Moorfield Angels</a>. Since then she has gone on to earn ten caps for the English national team; this includes her appearances in the <a href="2017%20Rugby%20League%20World%20Cup">2017 World Cup</a>.
In late 2018 Stanley was given the 'Player of the Match' award as England beat France 54-4 in Carcassonne.
